title: Parental Controls: Dictation and Profanity (com.apple.ironwood.support)
description: The payload that configures parental control for dictation and profanity.

Ironwood Allowed.title: Allow use of Siri and Dictation
Ironwood Allowed.description: If 'false', disables dictation. Use 'allowDictation' in Restrictions instead.

Profanity Allowed.title: Allow Profanity in Dictation
Profanity Allowed.description: If 'false', suppresses profanity. Use 'forceAssistantProfanityFilter' in Restrictions instead.
